shows.info: The first 6 songs were streamed on Linkin Park's YouTube channel. The full show was streamed on Globoplay and Multishow, and filmed to be shown in cinemas in 2025.

shows.info: First show in Asia since 2015, and in South Korea since 2011. "The Emptiness Machine" from this show was used as Linkin Park's performance for the NRJ Music Awards in France on November 1, 2024.
